plot: The Unnameable tells the story of a Boy who grows up feeding an invisible Elephant in his room, and we follow him through his imagination, in out of his consciousness.
title: The Unnameable
plot_es: The Unnameable tells the story of a Boy who grows up feeding an invisible Elephant in his room, and we follow him through his imagination, in out of his consciousness.
plot_en: The Unnameable tells the story of a Boy who grows up feeding an invisible Elephant in his room, and we follow him through his imagination, in out of his consciousness.
